beer.beer_description: A clean, fresh, distinctive ale with hints of orange and spice from the hop, perfect with traditional English roasts and pies.  (Used to be called First Gold, was renamed in 2014-15)

items.badge_description: Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 65 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 14!

items.badge_description: Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 45 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 10!

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 360 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 73!
